data.actual_result: It doesn't let you out of the warning when you try to use Enter
data.expected_result: It should let you escape from the warning when pressing Enter
data.short_description: When you have the I'm pretty sure you don't want to do this sign pop up in perms, press enter twice and it won't let you escape from the warning.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into permissions and edit something for @ everyone - press enter twice when the warning pops up - try to escape from the warning - press okay - it won't let you escape until you try a lot
